data.title: UTICA COMETS 2023-24 PROMOTIONAL SCHEDULE
data.meta_description: Utica Comets Official Website, AHL Affiliate of the New Jersey Devils
data.text:
Utica Comets 2023-24 Promotional Schedule

October 13th - Opening Night Blackout

We all remember how it went last time. We’re back with a vengeance, wear your black Comets gear on opening night and bring the boys back with a BANG!

October 28th - Halloween with the Comets

Dress up and join us to trick-or-treat before the game. All of your favorite mascots will be spread throughout the building to celebrate Halloween!

November 11th - Veterans Day

Join us on a day to honor, remember, and recognize those who have served in the armed forces. This year, we are focusing on honoring local military families with special patches on our jerseys. Stay tuned for more details.

November 22nd - Thanksgiving Eve

Give Thanks, donate to good causes, and celebrate with us! Join us on the best party night of the season. $3 beers and a packed house.

December 10th - Autograph Session

Bring your favorite Comets gear to get signed by the whole team!

December 15th - Local Hockey Night

Our players will be wearing local youth and high school hockey jerseys before the game! Players will also be coming to team’s practices during the season. If your organization wants to participate, please email gregorysokol@uticacomets.com.

December 23rd - Christmas with the Comets

SANTA!!!! Come meet the big man and some of his friends as we get in the holiday spirit together. Hot chocolate, writing letters to players, and so many other fun holiday activities!

December 30th - Rockin’ the Rink

Tunes are back! Enjoy live music on the concourse and at the bars in the arena before the game and at intermission!

January 7th - Super Hero Day and Postgame Skate

COMETS TO THE RESCUE! Dress up as your favorite superheroes and enjoy a FLYING good time as we turn the building into a superhero movie. After the game, all our heroes can hop on the ice and skate with the players!

January 12th and 13th - Save of the Day Foundation Week

We’re adding to this great week with a Community Heros night on the 13th! Local first responders, doctors, teachers and more will be honored! If your group wants to participate, please email ericaSzczygiel@uticacomets.com.

January 27th - Arena Wide Mini Bobblehead Giveaway

4,000 bobbleheads! Everyone in attendance, and every Season Ticket Member will receive a free mini-bobblehead of one of our players!

February 3rd - Season Ticket Member Only Postgame Skate

Hop on the ice with our players! Not a season ticket member yet? Become one today at uticacomets.com/seasontickets.

February 23rd - Season Ticket Member Giveaway

Every Season Ticket Member will get a surprise gift!

March 8th and 9th - Utica Weekend

Our second annual Utica Weekend brings a specialty jersey, and celebrates everything Utica has to offer!

March 27th - Pucks for Paws presented by Staffworks

You asked, so we brought it back! Fans can bring their dogs to the game for one night only. A dog parade, giveaways, and fun activities for you and your pups! Find more details at uticacomets.com/dogs.

March 30th - IIHF Women’s World Championship Kickoff

As we prepare for one of the best events on the globe, we are sending the Comets away for two weeks and welcoming the best female hockey players in the world! Be with us to kick off this incredible event.

April 21st - Kids Day

All things kiddos! The concourse will be full of games and activities to make this Sunday the best for the family!

EVERY WEDNESDAY - $3 BEERS

As always, come enjoy $3 domestic drafts!

EVERY SATURDAY – Season Ticket Member Saturday
